data.meta_description: Hi-Fi Daddy Lyrics by Deluxtone Rockets. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
Stomp that rhythm and shake the blues Hi-Fi Daddy′s gonna make you move Hi-Fi Daddy's on The 45′s going 'round night long The joint's all jumping, and the crowd on the floor Shout it out now They′ll bawl for more You got that rhythm? (The Hi-Fi rhythm) The Hi-Fi rhythm (We got that rhythm) All night, that old man′s playing those songs Remember those summer nights The moon and stars were shining bright The old man playing that rhythm and blues Shaking that place with his jiving groove Hi-Fi Let it roll Daddy's got a fire burning in his soul Hi-Fi Let it ride Get that rhythm flowing deep inside And now Daddy′s gone The river of life flows on and on The joint's still jumping, and the crowd′s on the floor This time, brother, we'll scream for more You got that rhythm? (The Hi-Fi rhythm) The Hi-Fi rhythm (We got that rhythm) All night, that old man′s spinning those songs Writer(s): John Brown, Jason Sorn, James Vanboxell, Timothy Harvel
